EmailTemplate.name: Revisit Turbonomic (1493234437.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Revisit Turbonomic (1493234437.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 98 Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Anthony -I am following up from a voicemail I left on your phone. I know we have talked in the past, briefly, but I was hoping we could reconnect in the following weeks to see if Turbonomic could be a good fit. Basic info to remind you of what we do at Turbonomic is below: Turbonomic is also enabling customers to support and safely migrate across multi hypervisor environments (VMWare, Openstack etc) and new PaaS technologies, Containers, and Cloud Enablement. Some Key value points of the Turbonomic solution - Turbonomic sits on top of your virtualization platform (VMWare, HyperV, OpenStack, etc) It automates the workload placement, sizing, and capacity decisions for you to improve performance and drive efficiency of your cloud infrastructure. - Hybrid Cloud Management- Turbonomic intelligently determines which workloads to burst where and when to assure performance and maximize efficiency - Increase density by 20%-40% with intelligent placement actions (better utilization of existing infrastructure to lower CapX & OppX) - Reduce and control software licensing (CapX & OppX savings) - Accurately plan for the future and understand when you need to buy new hardware and where you need to put it. - Turbonomic installs in under an hour and will be providing immediate value within the first day. Below are links to data sheets with information on what our software does and the problem we solve. Turbonomic Overiew Do you have time to sync up for a conversation in the next week to discuss Turbonomic further? Katie NorchiSales Development RepresentativeO: 857.305.4618 C: 440.708.8477500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116
